Subjects: Gloria mundi est; transitoriness, of world
_description: Gloria mundi est — four lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Als a se flouwendeAls a skiȝe pasendeAls þe sadwen in
                    þe vndermel& als þe dore turnet on a quel
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 18.
